attributes.action: stop the TV Licence fee in light of the Abuse of children in the BBC
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC has been rocked by many scandles in the past . overpaid stars ect . But the cover up over the Jimmy Savile scandle is nothing short of a disgrace hundreds of children abused by this BBC employee on there premises . Its about time the BBC was funded by its own sales and not out of the British publics purse , So scrap the lices fees now and help stop state funded peados
How many more BBC stars and executives will be exposed . Stop the Licence fees now
